node.excerpt: A “simultaneous conversation” took place on August 16, 1967 between seven speakers in Toronto and New York with the cooperation of Bell…
This article examines how Louise Nevelson’s Dream House sculptures (1972-1973) simultaneously produced and disrupted notions of domesticity…

frontmatter.title: Keeping House with Louise Nevelson by Julia Bryan-Wilson
frontmatter.description: Oxford Art Journal, Volume 40, Issue 1, March 2017, Pages 109–131
